name: DIY Graham Crackers
description: It’s easier to buy a box of graham crackers…but these are naturally flavoured and so much tastier!
preparation: Add the first six ingredients to an electric mixer and pulse to combine.
Add the butter and pulse until it’s the consistency of cornmeal.
Add the remaining ingredients and pulse until combined.
On a floured board, roll out to 1.3" thick. Cut into squares and place on a Sheet Pan lined with a Sheet Pan Liner. Use a fork to poke decorative holes into cookies.
Bake for 20 minutes, or until the edges darken.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
